extendedInfo.description: Easily create a mobile app without programming by using your phone or tablet! The resulting native app can work on Android devices, iOS devices and more!Please be kind and try not to submit negative reviews as we iron out the kinks just let us know if you run into an issue and we will try to fix it ASAP.All builds (free or otherwise) are completely royalty free (you can install as much as you want without paying anything extra). Notice that sending a build is 1USD per build however you get free builds for Android that include Pingjam, Startapp and some ads in them.You can also pay Codename One to do the actual native app building process (certificates and other complex portions) right from the mobile app. We can submit your app to the store for you and from that point on it is free, no monthly subscription costs!You can take a free online course in building Maker applications here: https://www.udemy.com/cn1makerYou can create a very wide range of apps using Maker and you can also extend the tool with plugins using the Codename One development platform. Furthermore, if you reach a glass ceiling in the tool you can send a build that includes the source code and get back the full Codename One source code by email (10 USD cost) and then move to using the Codename One enterprise grade development environment on the desktop.If building the actual application or certificates and submitting it to the stores is too complicated, Codename One can help with that process as well using the premium build options in the build menu. Our engineers at Codename One will build and optionally submit your app to the stores for you.Note about permissions: the application asks for permissions such as dialing etc. since you can add such features to your application! The app itself is ad free and doesn't use these permissions for any purpose other than provide you the power to build this functionality into your app.

reviews.title: Great App!
reviews.comment: I\'ve started building my app and everything works fine except the rss with blogspot. I receive all entries from my blog but when I click in one post, a white screen appears. People can\'t view the full post. Thanks!!
reviews.author: Riki Ustrell

reviews.title: Good
reviews.comment: But need the more options like tab menu,gui enhancement and publish on play store

reviews.title: Stupendous!
